bit_field_value.name: CR_EDBG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: When in debug mode, the DMA continues to operate.

bit_field_value.name: CR_EDBG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: When in debug mode, the DMA stalls the start of a new channel. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when the system exits debug mode or the EDBG bit is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: CR_ERCA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fixed priority arbitration is used for channel selection within each group.

bit_field_value.name: CR_ERCA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Round robin arbitration is used for channel selection within each group.

bit_field_value.name: CR_ERGA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fixed priority arbitration is used for selection among the groups.

bit_field_value.name: CR_ERGA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Round robin arbitration is used for selection among the groups.

bit_field_value.name: CR_HOE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal operation

bit_field_value.name: CR_HOE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Any error causes the HALT bit to set. Subsequently, all service requests are ignored until the HALT bit is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: CR_HALT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal operation

bit_field_value.name: CR_HALT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Stall the start of any new channels. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when this bit is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: CR_CLM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself goes through channel arbitration before being activated again.

bit_field_value.name: CR_CLM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself does not go through channel arbitration before being activated again. Upon minor loop completion, the channel activates again if that channel has a minor loop channel link enabled and the link channel is itself. This effectively applies the minor loop offsets and restarts the next minor loop.

bit_field_value.name: CR_EMLM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disabled. TCDn.word2 is defined as a 32-bit NBYTES field.

bit_field_value.name: CR_EMLM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enabled. TCDn.word2 is redefined to include individual enable fields, an offset field, and the NBYTES field. The individual enable fields allow the minor loop offset to be applied to the source address, the destination address, or both. The NBYTES field is reduced when either offset is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CR_ECX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal operation

bit_field_value.name: CR_ECX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer in the same fashion as the CX bit. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The ECX bit clears itself after the cancel is honored. In addition to cancelling the transfer, ECX treats the cancel as an error condition, thus updating the Error Status register (DMAx_ES) and generating an optional error interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: CR_CX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal operation

bit_field_value.name: CR_CX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The CX bit clears itself after the cancel has been honored. This cancel retires the channel normally as if the minor loop was completed.

bit_field_value.name: ES_DBE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No destination bus error

bit_field_value.name: ES_DBE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a destination write

bit_field_value.name: ES_SBE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No source bus error

bit_field_value.name: ES_SBE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a source read

bit_field_value.name: ES_SGE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No scatter/gather configuration error

bit_field_value.name: ES_SGE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DLASTSGA field. This field is checked at the beginning of a scatter/gather operation after major loop completion if TCDn_CSR[ESG] is enabled. TCDn_DLASTSGA is not on a 32 byte boundary.

bit_field_value.name: ES_NCE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No NBYTES/CITER configuration error

bit_field_value.name: ES_NCE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_NBYTES or TCDn_CITER fields. TCDn_NBYTES is not a multiple of TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE] and TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE], or TCDn_CITER[CITER] is equal to zero, or TCDn_CITER[ELINK] is not equal to TCDn_BITER[ELINK]

bit_field_value.name: ES_DOE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No destination offset configuration error

bit_field_value.name: ES_DOE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DOFF field. TCDn_DOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

bit_field_value.name: ES_DAE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No destination address configuration error

bit_field_value.name: ES_DAE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DADDR field. TCDn_DADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

bit_field_value.name: ES_SOE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No source offset configuration error

bit_field_value.name: ES_SOE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SOFF field. TCDn_SOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

bit_field_value.name: ES_SAE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No source address configuration error.

bit_field_value.name: ES_SAE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SADDR field. TCDn_SADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

bit_field.name: ERRCHN
bit_field.description: Error Channel Number or Canceled Channel Number

bit_field_value.name: ES_CPE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No channel priority error

bit_field_value.name: ES_CPE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error in the channel priorities within a group. Channel priorities within a group are not unique.

bit_field_value.name: ES_GPE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No group priority error

bit_field_value.name: ES_GPE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error among the group priorities. All group priorities are not unique.

bit_field_value.name: ES_ECX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No canceled transfers

bit_field_value.name: ES_ECX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The last recorded entry was a canceled transfer by the error cancel transfer input

bit_field.name: VLD
bit_field.description: Logical OR of all ERR status bits

bit_field_value.name: ES_VLD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No ERR bits are set.

bit_field_value.name: ES_VLD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: At least one ERR bit is set indicating a valid error exists that has not been cleared.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD0_CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

bit_field.name: ELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD0_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel is not explicitly started.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request.

bit_field.name: INTMAJOR
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled.

bit_field.name: INTHALF
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

bit_field.name: MAJORELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No eDMA engine stalls

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b10
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD7_CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

bit_field.name: ELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD7_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel is not explicitly started.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request.

bit_field.name: INTMAJOR
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled.

bit_field.name: INTHALF
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

bit_field.name: MAJORELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No eDMA engine stalls

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b10
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each R/W.

register.name: TCD11_CITER_ELINKYES
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

bit_field.name: ELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD11_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b1

bit_field.name: INTHALF

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

register.name: TCD15_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

register.name: TCD19_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request.

bit_field.name: INTMAJOR
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled.

bit_field.name: INTHALF
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

bit_field.name: MAJORELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No eDMA engine stalls

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b10
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field.name: MLOFF
bit_field.description: If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DMLOE_0b1

register.name: TCD23_CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

bit_field.name: ELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD23_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

bit_field.name: ELINK

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b0

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD26_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

register.name: TCD30_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

bit_field.name: DLASTSGA
bit_field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather). If (TCDn_CSR[ESG] = 0) then: Adjustment value added to the destination address at the completion of the major iteration count. This value can apply to restore the destination address to the initial value or adjust the address to reference the next data structure. This field uses two's complement notation for the final destination address adjustment. Otherwise: This address points to the beginning of a 0-modulo-32-byte region containing the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel. This channel reload is performed as the major iteration count completes. The scatter/gather address must be 0-modulo-32-byte, otherwise a configuration error is reported.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel is not explicitly started.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_START_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request.

bit_field.name: INTMAJOR
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTMAJOR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled.

bit_field.name: INTHALF
bit_field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_INTHALF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_DREQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_ESG_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

bit_field.name: MAJORELINK
bit_field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_MAJORELINK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No eDMA engine stalls

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b10
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each R/W.

bit_field_value.name: TCD_BWC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each R/W.
